channel.title: OldskoolPK
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i421.photobucket.com/albums/pp297/RyPrester/ospk2.png[/img] [b]About us[/b] OldskoolPK is a fast growing Private Server who originally was started on the 16th April 2010. The server has been growing rapidly during the past 11 months, and we feel as if we need to expand our community. The server hasn't been on major advertisment websites such as Moparscape. Yet we have finally made our move. With the help of our staff members we have re-arranged a total of $500 and we are considering in buying a moparscape sponsorship. We also need to buy a more powerful VPS which can also be done. [b]Community[/b] OldskoolPK's community is generally friendly and welcoming to any new members. We ensure that our players are in their best manners and are polite towards each other and our staff team. * [b]Server[/b] Our server has moved from a Deltascape to a Project insanity based source. we wish to maintain our 317 base as we find it is the best type of sources out there. We are currently working on a Ihybrid source which we are weekly updating. [b]Staff member(s)[/b] Our server has been struggling to find mature and responsible staff members. We do not accept imaturity and untrustable personnels. We require our staff to be active, dedicated, reliable and trustworthy. Previously we have came accross people who seemed to be trustworthy but has shown their true colours and either betrayed us or shown a lack of respect towards the server. [b]Features[/b] *New*Help Area*New* An area with 6 NPC's which give you information on the server, such as: Money-making,Donating,Forums,Rules,How to become staff..etc 525 Graphics Incredible donator benefits 1) Gambling 2) Donater Shop 3) Private Monsters 4) Donater zone 5) Donater status on forums 6) Donater symbol in-game New home Autocasting works Clan chat works Pming works New HP bars New curses, 100% with emotes Skillcape Emotes All specs work 100% Teleports Revised, much better now Lunar spell book works. Corporeal Beast Tormented Demons Full GWD JAD Chaos elemental New items Warriors Guild Chaotics New items [b]Promotional Video[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H5JA2gMJ5Go [b]Images[/b] [b]PK [/b] item.title: OldskoolPK
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

I’m applying for a moderator position. I don’t want administrator rights. That takes all of the fun away.

Years of experience: 4
Age: 15
Gender: M
Server(s) you have previously worked with: A really, really, really long list. Mostly mod, sometimes admin, or some other kind of job, including model maker or quality assurance.
Reason for appliance: Interested to see how private servers have changed, I haven’t truly played one for months.
What can you contribute to OldskoolPK: Well, you said your staff can be mean, disrespectful or outlandish, and I can tell you I’m not. If someone is breaking rules or being rude / racist/ etc., I won’t just ban or mute, but learn what actually happened. I mod well, and I’m sure many (other) well respected people on these forums could back me up.

Read full topic

item.title: OldskoolPK
item.dc:creator: @oldskoolpk oldskoolpk
item.description:
@oldskoolpk wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:16, topic:389763”]The first picture sets the mood for the server (for me). As in the way I want to look at the server. The first picture is killing the Chaos Elemental. Every server has that… Now all the pictures are boring for me.

I’m not sure if this is just for me or for everyone, probably just for me. I recommend putting the cool pictures first, that way players like the way the server is set up and continue looking instead of just glancing and skipping the pictures.

With that out of the way, good luck with your server.[/quote]

Thanks, I’ve changed the position of the picture

Read full topic

item.title: OldskoolPK
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

The first picture sets the mood for the server (for me). As in the way I want to look at the server. The first picture is killing the Chaos Elemental. Every server has that… Now all the pictures are boring for me.

I’m not sure if this is just for me or for everyone, probably just for me. I recommend putting the cool pictures first, that way players like the way the server is set up and continue looking instead of just glancing and skipping the pictures.

With that out of the way, good luck with your server.

Read full topic
